parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds score to the Xbox Live Statistics score for the given unit (or the commander unit of the given vehicle). (Also available in OFPE & VBS2)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addLiveStats''' score

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> score: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[addLiveStats]] 10;</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> -
</value></part></template>



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
